item.title: Coca-Cola is about to report earnings. Here's what to expect
item.description: Shares of Coke have risen 7% over the past year, raising its market cap up to $275 billion.

item.title: McDonald's revenue disappoints, as U.S. sales see worst drop since pandemic
item.description: Shares of McDonald's have risen just 2% over the past year.
